channel.title: GDACS RSS information
channel.description: Near real-time alerts about natural disaster with a potential humanitarian impact

item.title: Green earthquake alert (Magnitude 5.7M, Depth:10km) in Japan 13/06/2016 04:21 UTC, No people within 100km.
item.description: On 6/13/2016 4:21:43 AM, an earthquake occurred in Japan potentially affecting No people within 100km. The earthquake had Magnitude 5.7M, Depth:10km.
item.dc:subject: EQ1

gdacs:resource.gdacs:title: Country disaster profile (DesInventar)
gdacs:resource.gdacs:description: This Country Profile shows a set of typical results known as "Preliminary Analysis" comming from the disaster database.
